backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing blog posts in a map with create, fetch, list, and search functions sorted by publish time.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing planned features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the root React app through main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and referencing the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing URLs for home, blog, about, tasks, and sample blog posts.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Instructions for updating sitemap.xml when blog posts change.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes for home, blog pages, about page, and three task pages.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Card component showing blog title, date, excerpt, and link to post detail.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyTaskSe: Interactive section with random task links and a secret code submission form.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with intro message and CTA buttons linking to blog and about pages.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksMe: Displays a promotional card for TimeBucks with earning details, signup bonus, and a CTA button linking externally.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksSt: Shows a step-by-step guide for using TimeBucks with numbered steps and a special note.
frontend/src/components/home/TranscribeM: Presents an overview of TranscribeMe transcription work with steps, tips, and a CTA link.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Renders a welcome message introducing the site owner and upcoming features.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Implements a slide-in mobile navigation menu with links, scroll lock, and escape-to-close support.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays footer content including about text, quick links, help links, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides the site header with logo, navigation, task dropdown, and mobile menu trigger.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the overall site layout with background, header, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Renders a styled placeholder box representing different ad slot variants.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Loads an Adsterra script once and renders a container for the native banner.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Displays a styled placeholder card for affiliate product promotions.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title, meta tags, and canonical link for SEO and social sharing.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskIntera: Provides a UI for opening a task link and submitting a secret code with success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Fetches posts, single posts, and search results using the actor with fallbacks to sample data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and context provisioning.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and site-wide color variables, backgrounds, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Provides sample blog posts used when backend post retrieval fails or returns empty.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Exports a list of admin help contact links.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Defines global site metadata including name, description, URL, and default image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with SEO metadata, biography details, expertise sections, and contact info with ad placement.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a blog list with SEO, loading and error states, ad placement, and a grid of BlogPostCard components.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Fetches and renders a full blog post with metadata, ads, affiliate link placeholder, and navigation back to the blog.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the home page with a welcome section, SEO metadata, and a call‑to‑action button linking to Task 1.
frontend/src/pages/Task1Page.tsx: Presents Task 1 with SEO metadata and a TaskInteractionCard pointing to an external task URL.
frontend/src/pages/Task2Page.tsx: Presents Task 2 with SEO metadata and a TaskInteractionCard linked to its task URL.
frontend/src/pages/Task3Page.tsx: Presents Task 3 with SEO metadata and a TaskInteractionCard linked to its task URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended styling tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project state, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the site’s design and functionality.
